dimensions: Overall: 243.8 x 47 cm (8 ft. x 18 1/2 in.)
title: Views of the American War of Independence
description: This is a full set of 32 panels plus an extra set of Boston Harbor along with four hand painted panels.  Contains scenes of soldiers and battles, promenades and patriotism, printed over the background of "Views of North America".
name: Scenic
